greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of distinct prime factors of the smallest odd number with exactly n divisors.
link: Hans Havermann, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000 (using the b-file of A038547 provided by _Don Reble_)
mathematica: PrimeNu[Table[Select[Range[1, 532000, 2], DivisorSigma[0, #] == k + 1 &, 1], {k, 0, 15}] // Flatten] (* _G. C. Greubel_, May 07 2017 *)
results.author: _Ray Chandler_, Sep 22 2006
ext: Typo in A_number fixed by _Matthew Vandermast_, May 03 2014
